content: kelsey morton pattern vine belt bag materials main yarn worsted weight 4 - 4 5 mm hook accent yarn bulky weight 5 - 6 mm hook i used scrap yarn so i have no idea on the yardage/weights one large button abbreviations mc= magic_ring tc= triple crochet chain= chain pst= picot stitch chain 3 stick your hook through st= stitch the third chain from the hook yarn over and pull slip_stitch= slip_stitch the yarn through the stitch and loop on your hook single_crochet= single_crochet = repeat previous row decrease= single_crochet 2 together half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet double_crochet= double_crochet pattern full circle start with a magic_ring 1 6 single_crochet in mc slip_stitch to join pull mc closed 6 st 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 st 3 chain 1 2 single_crochet in st then 1 single_crochet in next st repeat x6 18 st 4 chain 1 2 single_crochet in st 1 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st repeat x6 24 st 5 chain 1 2 single_crochet in st 1 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st repeat x6 30 st … repeat pattern up to row 20 120 st half circle start with a magic_ring 1 3 single_crochet in magic_ring turn do not join 3 st 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in each st turn 6 st 3 chain 1 2 single_crochet in st 1 single_crochet in next st repeat x3 turn 9 st 4 chain 1 2 single_crochet in st 1 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st repeat x3 turn 12 st 5 chain 1 2 single_crochet in st 1 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st repeat x3 turn 15 st … repeat pattern up to row 20 60 st bottom of bag 1 chain 5 single_crochet in each chain starting in 2nd chain from end 4 st 2 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in each stitch of previous row 4 st 3 4 st 4 4 st 5 4 st 6 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in first st 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 5 st 7 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in each stitch of previous row 5 st 8 5 st 9 5 st 10 5 st 11 5 st 12 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in first 2 st 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 6 st 13 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in each stitch of previous row 6 st 14 6 st 15 6 st 16 6 st 17 6 st 18 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in first 2 st 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 7 st 19 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in each stitch of previous row 7 st 20 7 st 21 7 st 22 7 st 23 7 st 24 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in first 3 st
